The resetTrimExclusions Statement

The ZKM Script resetTrimExclusions statement removes

  • all trim exclusions that may have been set by preceding trimExclude statements,
  • all trim unexclusions that may have been set by preceding trimUnexclude statements.

Example

resetTrimExclusions;

Syntax

"resetTrimExclusions" ";"
